member.name: T:Bonsai.Scripting.IronPython.PythonSelectMany
member.summary: Represents an operator that uses a Python script to project each element of an observable sequence into multiple elements.

member.name: M:Bonsai.Scripting.IronPython.PythonSelectMany.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: P:Bonsai.Scripting.IronPython.PythonSelectMany.Name
member.summary: Gets or sets the name of the python operator.

member.name: P:Bonsai.Scripting.IronPython.PythonSelectMany.Description
member.summary: Gets or sets a description for the python operator.

member.name: P:Bonsai.Scripting.IronPython.PythonSelectMany.Script
member.summary: Gets or sets the script that determines how each element is projected into a sequence of elements.

member.name: T:Bonsai.Scripting.IronPython.PythonSource
member.summary: Represents an operator that uses a Python script to generate an observable sequence of values.

member.name: M:Bonsai.Scripting.IronPython.PythonSource.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: P:Bonsai.Scripting.IronPython.PythonSource.Name
member.summary: Gets or sets the name of the python source.

member.name: P:Bonsai.Scripting.IronPython.PythonSource.Description
member.summary: Gets or sets a description for the python source.

member.name: P:Bonsai.Scripting.IronPython.PythonSource.Script
member.summary: Gets or sets the script that determines the operation of the source.

member.name: T:Bonsai.Scripting.IronPython.PythonTransform
member.summary: Represents an operator that uses a Python script to transform each element of an observable sequence.
